action.action-desc: Mrs. Demings (for herself and Mr. Thompson of Mississippi) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Homeland Security

form.official-title: To amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to prohibit the expenditure of certain grant funds to purchase firearms, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Secure Communities and Safe Schools Act.

section.header: Prohibition on expenditure of certain Homeland Security grant funds to purchase firearms
section.text: Subsection (b) of section 2008 of the Homeland Security Act of 2002 (6 U.S.C. 609) is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

paragraph.text: A grant awarded under section 2003 or 2004 may not be used to purchase firearms and firearms accessories, such as ammunition, including for use by teachers.
